name: Swiss Colony Fire Department
description: Swiss Colony Fire Department is a volunteer fire department serving the London, Kentucky area. The department provides emergency fire protection services, fire prevention education, and community safety programs. They operate 24 hours a day and respond to fire emergencies, medical calls, and other emergency situations. The department also provides community outreach and safety education programs.
source: Verified from multiple online directories, fire department listings, and government sources
hours_of_operation: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
eligibility_requirements: Emergency services available to all residents in service area
populations_served: Residents of London and surrounding areas in Laurel County
cost_information: Emergency services provided at no cost to residents
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from multiple online directories including Yellow Pages, MapQuest, and USFireDept.com. Phone number (606) 877-1029 confirmed working and listed consistently across multiple sources. Address verified from Google Maps and multiple directory listings. Hours of operation confirmed as 24/7 from multiple sources. Emergency service status confirmed from fire department listings and community information. All information cross-referenced with multiple online sources for consistency. Department operates as a volunteer fire department serving the London, Kentucky area.
